      Computes the fix-point with all the scheduled constraints.

      Returns the state manager in charge of the global state of the solver.

      Adds a listener called whenever the fix-point.
      void post(BoolVar b)
      Forces the boolean variable to be true and then computes the fix-point.
      void post(Constraint c)
      Posts the constraint, that is call Constraint.post() and computes the fix-point.
      void post(Constraint c, boolean enforceFixPoint)
      Posts the constraint that is call Constraint.post() and optionally computes the fix-point.
      void schedule(Constraint c)
      Schedules the constraint to be propagated by the fix-point.

      • post

        public void post(Constraint c)
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Posts the constraint, that is call Constraint.post() and computes the fix-point. A InconsistencyException is thrown if by posting the constraint it is proven that there is no solution.
        Specified by:
        post in interface Solver
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint to be posted

      • post

        public void post(Constraint c,
                 boolean enforceFixPoint)
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Posts the constraint that is call Constraint.post() and optionally computes the fix-point. A InconsistencyException is thrown if by posting the constraint it is proven that there is no solution.
        Specified by:
        post in interface Solver
        Parameters:
        c - the constraint to be posted
        enforceFixPoint - is one wants to compute the fix-point after

      • post

        public void post(BoolVar b)
        Description copied from interface: Solver
        Forces the boolean variable to be true and then computes the fix-point.
        Specified by:
        post in interface Solver
        Parameters:
        b - the variable that must be set to true
